name: gistpod
description: CLI helpers for hosting ad-hoc CocoaPods podspecs as GitHub gists during rapid development
author: bryn austin bellomy <bryn.bellomy@gmail.com>

subcommands.username: set the GitHub username from which to retrieve gists (config file: ~/.gistpod)
subcommands.url: look up the latest gist URL for the specified CocoaPod
subcommands.pull: pull the latest data from the GitHub API into your local cache (~/.gistpod-cache)
subcommands.update: updates the gist refs for the given Pods (or all Pods, if none are specified) in the specified Podfile to the latest revisions
